title: Kim Kardashian rocks clinging black leather trousers as she steps out in LA with Scott Disick
text:
He may no longer be with Kourtney Kardashian.

But Scott Disick is still close personally and professionally with their family, as was clear when he was glimpsed in Los Angeles this Tuesday.

The 36-year-old reality TV hunk was spotted out and about with Kourtney’s 38-year-old younger sister Kim Kardashian.

Still close: The 36-year-old reality TV hunk Scott Disick (right) was spotted out in Los Angeles Tuesday with his ex Kourtney Kardashian's younger sister Kim Kardashian (left)

Kim accentuated her unmistakable features with a heavy dose of makeup and sported a luxurious hairdo.

The brunette bombshell slipped her legendary curves into a fitted white tee, which she tucked in to emphasize her trim torso.

Balancing on a pair of snakeskin print heels, Kim pulled on a pair of clinging black leather trousers for her outing.

The small screen siren and sex tape icon accessorized with a sleek pair of gold-tinted sunglasses.

Mover and shaker: Kim accentuated her unmistakable features with a heavy dose of makeup and sported a luxurious hairdo

Hello, gorgeous: The brunette bombshell slipped her legendary curves into a fitted white tee, which she tucked in to emphasize her trim torso

Meanwhile, Scott warded off the autumnal chill in a flowing grey sweater with a pair of stylishly faded sky blue jeans.

The E! network dreamboat, who is dating Lionel Richie’s 21-year-old daughter Sofia, accessorized with shades.

Scott, who shares his three children Mason, nine, Penelope, seven, and Reign, four, with Kourtney, rounded off his ensemble with sneakers.

Sizzling sensation: Balancing on a pair of snakeskin print heels, Kim pulled on a pair of clinging black leather trousers for her outing

Legend in her own time: Balancing on a pair of snakeskin print heels, Kim pulled on a pair of clinging black leather trousers for her outing

Meanwhile, Kim shares her four children – North, six, Saint, three, Chicago, one, and Psalm, five months – with rap diva Kanye West.

Kanye released a Christian album called Jesus Is King on Friday and while promoting on Carpool Karaoke this week shared that he plans to have seven children with Kim.

He said of his marriage to Kim: ‘People thought it would be uncool to be married and then I got married and people thought: “Oh, that looks cool."'
description: He may no longer be with Kourtney Kardashian.
